Title: Enacts the "New York state credit risk transparency and investor protection act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York state credit risk transparency and investor protection act" requiring issuers of state-backed bonds to issue quarterly risk statements.
LawCode: Add ยง103-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to enacting "the New York state credit risk transparency and investor protection act"
